title: BIT3MAST3R-XTREME 100000
tag: You know it's X-TREME because it's missing the first 'e' in 'extreme'.
description: This buzzbait features a propeller blade and longarm made of super high-strength titanium.  In fact, the skirt is made with titanium, as well.

title: The Ninja
tag: While you spent your youth making money and dating women, I studied the blade
description: A sleek Damascus steel buzzbait with ninja star blades and a miniature katana instead of a hook.

title: The Kitchen Sink
description: With three longarms, three weights with skirts, and a plurality of hooks, this spinnerbait is extra in every way.
